description: This source file defines the NotesStateService class, which manages the state (search, folder, tag filters, and selected note) for the notes page in an Angular application. It provides methods to set filters and get filtered notes as observables.

classes.name: NotesStateService
classes.description: Service maintaining the state for notes, including search, folder, tag filters, and selected note ID, providing observables for filtered notes and selection.

methods.name: setSearch
methods.description: Sets the current search filter value.

methods.name: setFolder
methods.description: Sets the current folder filter, optional.

methods.name: setTag
methods.description: Sets the current tag filter, optional.

methods.name: selectNote
methods.description: Sets the currently selected note ID.

methods.name: getSelectedId
methods.description: Returns an observable of the currently selected note ID.

methods.name: getFilteredNotes
methods.description: Returns an observable of notes filtered based on the current search, folder, and tag filters.
